title: Solo Queue Champ Select problems
body:
This has probably been raised before but I've just had far too many of these scenarios lately...

Stupid people in champ select saying things like, "Ban <XX> champ or I'll run it down mid", "I don't support, swap or I feed" then when they don't get what they want they just pick some troll pick...

Naturally I don't want to waste my time so I always dodge in this kind of scenario. Now I'm not bothered that I lose LP or that I have to wait however much time before my next ranked game.

I am bothered by the fact that we don't get a chance to report players like these... unless we play through 20 minutes of pointlessness and frustration.

Currently, if someone dodges, the troll has won - they've picked a troll pick, someone else has dodged. Not only has the troll managed to stop someone else from enjoying the game for a while, now they get to try again and get a better role or just troll another unfortunate group of players.

Some people don't have much time in the day and want to just enjoy a ranked game or two, but if this scenario occurs, they might not get to even play and if they do, they just waste 20 mins of their time.

I feel like being able to report people in champ select should be an option. That or a chance to remake. People need to be punished for ruining games before they even start. I understand a feature like this would be a challenge to implement well but it's just got to be done - It sickens me that, at present, players can get away with doing this.

Would be happy to hear people's thoughts on this.

replies.body: You missed the worst ones. "GIVE ME THAT LANE!.". You refuse. They ban whatever you indicated you were going to pick.

Oh yeah forgot about the ones that ban other people's indicated picks in retaliation...

Or some that just completely ignore their role and pick whatever champ they want.. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

report for threatening to troll?

i'd understand verbal abuse and what not, although if u report for that just man up, but i dont think threatening to troll is against the rules.
Dude. They are about to waste 20+ minutes of my time. I'd rather not "man up" in this situation.
the man up part refers to verbal abuse. threatening to troll is different, and im almost certain that its unreportable
